title: Yucatan Organic Chicken with Citrus & Chile

instructions.default: Heat chicken in a covered saucepan with juices for 10 min or until warm.
instructions.Frozen Full: Defrost. Heat chicken in a covered saucepan with juices for 10 min.
instructions.Frozen Half: Defrost. Heat chicken in a covered saucepan with juices for 10 min.
